name: Deserted Alpha
description:
Requires winrar to be extracted sorry...

This game is in alpha and alot of the features haven't been implemented

Once these features are added this project will be marked as released and a new project will be made for the beta (for people who want to experience the old times if it reaches that point who knows)

https://discord.gg/YJTnazvPXp - The discord server, allows notifications for updates, news and helps give feed back to me directly

If any of you are a linux user please state in the comments, I will upload a linux version as soon as someone does (I'm not sure if i can export to mac)
